channel.title: MYB

item.title: Here Are The 2026 Best Picture Oscar Nominees Ranked By Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Here are the 10 2026 Best Picture Oscar nominees and how they stack up in terms of critic and audience Rotten Tomatoes score.

item.title: Anthropic Releases A New ‘Constitution’ For Claude
item.description: With a newly published constitution for its Claude model, Anthropic is teaching AI not just what to avoid but why certain boundaries exist.

item.title: ‘Return To Silent Hill’ Is The Worst-Reviewed Video Game Movie In 19 Years
item.description: Return to Silent Hill is in theaters this weekend, arriving with the lowest Rotten Tomatoes score in nearly two decades of video game movies.
